Ayah Tiri di Malang Tega Aniaya Balita Hingga Tewas
01 Nov 2019, 11:40 by Hanum Oktavia


Ayah Tiri di Malang Tega Aniaya Balita Hingga Tewas

KBRN, Malang: Seorang pria bernama Ery Age Anwar (36) tega menganiaya Agnes Arnelita, balita berusia tiga tahun hingga tewas. Ironisnya, Ery merupakan ayah tiri korban. Jika sebelumnya tersangka mengakui bahwa anaknya meninggal akibat tenggelam di kamar mandi, namun akhirnya ia mengaku telah melakukan penganiayaan hingga Agnes meninggal.
Hal itu terungkap setelah kepolisian melakukan autopsi pada jenazah korban. Dari hasil autopsi tersebut, ditemukan sejumlah luka lebam, luka bakar, dan kerusakan jaringan dalam tubuh berupa pendarahan akibat usus besar yang robek. Kini, Ery harus mendekam di jeruji besi tahanan Polres Malang Kota untuk mempertanggungjawabkan perbuatannya. 
Kapolres Malang Kota, AKBP Dony Alexander mengungkapkan, adanya luka lebam diperkuat dengan hasil autopsi membuat kepolisian menduga adanya tindakan kekerasan yang dialami koran sebelum meninggal dunia. “Kita melakukan autopsi dan menginterogasi ulang tersangka. Hingga akhirnya ia mengaku telah melakukan penganiayaan pada korban,” katanya, Jumat (01/11/2019).
Lebih lanjut Kapolres mengungkapkan, dari hasil pengakuan tersangka, penganiayaan tersebut kerap dilakukan lantaran Agnes sering buang air kecil dan buang air besar di sembarang tempat. Kejadian penganiayaan ini dilakukan tersangka di rumah kontrakannya yang berada di kawasan Perumahan Tlogowaru Indah, Kota Malang.  “Karena pelaku jengkel, ia menyiram air ke korban hingga terjatuh. Kemudian pelaku menginjak tubuh korban beberapa kali. Hal ini membuat korban kesulitan bernafas,” ungkap Dony.
Selain kesulitan bernafas, korban juga mengalami kejang dan menggigil kedinginan. Tersangka pun panik, kemudian mengoleskan minyak telon ke tubuh korban. Saat kejadian, ibu kandung korban, Hermin (31) sedang bekerja di luar sebagai marketing perumahan. “Karena masih menggigil kedinginan, Ery menghangatkan tubuh korban di atas kompor hingga menyebabkan kaki sebelah kanan korban terbakar. Karena tidak ada hasilnya, akhirnya tersangka membawa korban ke rumah sakit Refa Husada, dengan berdalih bahasa korban tenggelam di kamar mandi,” ujarnya.
“Setelah ditangani tim dokter, nyawa korban tidak tertolong. Kemudian jenazah kan dibawa ke rumah keluarga besar di Tajinan Kabupaten Malang. Tetapi pihak keluarga merasa ada kejanggalan karena ditemukan banyak luka di tubuh jenazah. Akhirnya keluarga menghubungi polisi, jenazah kemudian dibawa ke Kamar Mayat Rumah Sakit Saiful Anwar untuk diautopsi,” imbuh AKBP Dony.
Atas dasar itulah polisi mengamankan Ery dan istrinya Hermin untuk dimintai keterangan. Hingga Ery mengaku telah menganiaya korban. Akibat perbuatannya, tersangka dijerat pasal 80 ayat 3 Undang-undang RI nomor 35 tahun 2014 tentang perlindungan anak. ”Ancaman hukumannya 15 tahun penjara," tandasnya.

Stepfather in Malang Tega Torture Toddler to Death
Nov 01 2019, 11:40 by Hanum Oktavia


Stepfather in Malang Tega Torture Toddler to Death

KBRN, Malang: A man named Ery Age Anwar (36) has the heart to persecute Agnes Arnelita, a three-year-old toddler to death. Ironically, Ery is the victim's stepfather. If the suspect had previously admitted that his son died from drowning in the bathroom, but finally he claimed to have committed persecution until Agnes died.
This was revealed after the police conducted an autopsy on the victim's body. From the results of the autopsy, found a number of bruises, burns, and tissue damage in the body in the form of bleeding due to a torn colon. Now, Ery must languish in the iron bars of Malang City Police prisoners to take responsibility for his actions.
Malang City Police Chief, AKBP Dony Alexander revealed, the presence of bruises strengthened by the results of an autopsy made the police suspect the acts of violence experienced by the newspaper before dying. "We do an autopsy and re-interrogate the suspect. Until finally he claimed to have mistreated victims, "he said, Friday (11/01/2019).
The police chief further revealed, from the results of the suspect's confession, the persecution was often carried out because Agnes often urinated and defecated in any place. The incident was carried out by the suspect in his rented house in the Tlogowaru Indah residential area, Malang. "Because the culprit is annoyed, he splashes water on the victim until he falls. Then the perpetrator stepped on the victim's body several times. This makes it difficult for the victim to breathe, "said Dony.
In addition to difficulty breathing, the victim also experienced seizures and chills. The suspect panicked, then applied telon oil to the victim's body. At the time of the incident, the victim's biological mother, Hermin (31) was working outside as a housing marketing. "Because he was still shivering with cold, Ery warmed the victim's body on the stove to cause the victim's right leg to catch fire. Because there was no result, the suspect finally took the victim to the Refa Husada hospital, arguing that the victim drowned in the bathroom, "he said.
"After being treated by a team of doctors, the victim's life was beyond help. Then the corpse was taken to a large family home in Malang Crafts. But the family felt there was something strange because there were many wounds found on the body. Finally the family contacted the police, the body was then taken to the Saiful Anwar Hospital Corpse Room for an autopsy, "added AKBP Dony.
On this basis the police secured Ery and his wife Hermin for questioning. Until Ery claimed to have mistreated the victim. As a result of his actions, the suspect was charged under article 80 paragraph 3 of RI Law number 35 of 2014 concerning child protection. "The threat of a sentence of 15 years in prison," he said.
